entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Collection expressions can perform covariant conversion of ReadOnlySpan in emit #71106
  • [Bug] Only allow a single instance of VS telemetry in the language server #71101
  • [Bug] Language server extension dlls with analyzers and MEF parts get loaded twice into different ALCs #71100
  • Rich copy/paste of C# source code into Office fails in the latest Visual Studio preview #71099
    17.9
  • Could not find rule set file #71096
  • Layering violation: Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.EditorFeatures.Wpf.csproj references Microsoft.VisualStudio.Shell.15.0 #71095
  • PreferredUILang is not accessible from Incremental Generators #71094
  • `MemberNotNull` not works for local functions #71092

Closed

  • `[ImmutableObjectAttribute(...)]` causes NullReferenceException in CSharpUseCollectionExpressionForFluentDiagnosticAnalyzer #70981
  • Roslyn emits redundant non-taken conditional branch for Nullable<T> == comparison #56875
    17.9
  • 'Use collection expressions' should not disappear if the target element type contains a mismatching tuple element name #70998
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34404.193 #71093

PullRequests

Created

  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and… #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Loosen compiler restriction which was not required by the spec #71110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Fix use-collection-expr when it breaks type inference with arrays #71105
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Rename automatic restore requests to be more explicit #71104
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report diagnostics for inline array types that are not valid as type arguments. #71103
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Check Frame's VSFPROPID_IsDocDataInitialized before Getting DocData #71102
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Remove dead goto-def/peek/ctrl-click EA impls for TS. TS is now entirely on LSP for these experiences. #71098
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Disable ExtractMethod and VerifyTextSync after 17.9P1 failures #71089
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2329764 #71109
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #71108
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #71107
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update `features/roles` with latest bits from `main` branch #70874
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #71091
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.6 #71090
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid leaking text views on cancellation #71081
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid redundant `HasValue` call in lifted custom binary operator #70934
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged, Next
  • Still offer 'use collection expression' when tehre is a tuple name mismatch in the code. #71085
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #71113
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Set order of precedence for obsoletion attribute family #71043
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Upgrade versions #71087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Draft - testing out new API to get semantic model with nullability analysis disabled #71036
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Support implicit indexer access in object initializers #70649
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cancel the request to copilot when typing start #71055
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support organizing imports as part of LSP document formatting #70538
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add IVT from EA.Razor to MS.ANC.Razor.Test.Common.Tooling #71086
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update MSBuild ref dependency #71069
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update and unskip Razor test #70855
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
